page.name: Demonstrations of the Text Formatter
page.text: @top !SECTIONS -*Headers>@headers* -*Lists>@lists* -*Miscellaneous>@miscellaneous* -*External Links>@external* -*Internal Links>@internal* -*Append Fields>@append* -*HTML Support>@html* @headers !HEADERS !A Header !!A Bigger Header !!!The Biggest Header @lists !LISTS -I -am -a -list, #an #ordered #list, #and #-an #-embedded #-list @miscellaneous !MISCELLANEOUS A horizontal line: _ |I|am| |a|table| =a = preformatted = text An uploaded file: <?file src="test.txt"?> An aliased uploaded file: <?file src="test.txt" alt="text"?> An uploaded image (notice how the page upload overrides the site upload): <?image src="swiki.gif" alt="Swiki!"?> Special Characters: < > & ☆ &at; @external !EXTERNAL LINKS An html link: *http://www.squeak.org/* A image reference: *http://minnow.cc.gatech.edu/schemes/swiki/swiki.gif* An e-mail link: *Jochen.Rick@cc.gatech.edu* @internal !INTERNAL LINKS An internal link: *5* An aliased internal link: *My Page>5* An aliased relative link: *sections>@top* A relative link: *@top* A new link: *My New Page* (simply press 'create' to create the new page) @append !APPEND FIELDS An append area (that adds horizontal lines after each comment): +_ @html !HTML SUPPORT <html>5 ! = 5 * 4 * 3 * 2 * 1 = 120 </html>
